title: What is a scatter plot?
text: A scatter plot displays values for two variables for a set of data, using Cartesian coordinates.

title: Correlation and Visualization
text: Correlation shows how two variables change together. Which type of plot best shows this relationship?

title: Visual Appearance of a Scatter Plot
text: In a scatter plot, each dot represents a data point, typically mapping one quantitative variable to the x-axis and another to the y-axis.

title: Understanding the Options
text: From the following options, which one do you think best shows the relationship or correlation between two variables?
